name: Laptop
description: Powerful laptop with a quad-core i5 processor, 8GB RAM, 256GB SSD, and a 14-inch FHD display.

name: Smartphone
description: Feature-rich smartphone with a 6.2-inch screen, 12MP dual camera, 128GB storage, and a 4000mAh battery.

name: Wireless Headphones
description: High-quality wireless headphones with over-ear design, 20 hours of battery life, and a sleek black color.

name: Watches
description: Smartwatch with a 1.3-inch AMOLED display, water-resistant design, fitness tracking features, and a stylish silver color.

name: Speakers
description: High-quality wireless headphones with over-ear design, 20 hours of battery life, and a sleek black color.

name: Television
description: Smartwatch with a 1.3-inch AMOLED display, water-resistant design, fitness tracking features, and a stylish silver color.

name: Tablet
description: Lightweight tablet with a 10.1-inch HD display, 64GB storage, and 10 hours of battery life.

name: Bluetooth Speaker
description: Portable Bluetooth speaker with powerful bass, 12-hour battery life, and water-resistant design.

name: Gaming Mouse
description: Ergonomic gaming mouse with customizable RGB lighting, 16000 DPI sensor, and 7 programmable buttons.

name: 4K Monitor
description: 27-inch 4K UHD monitor with HDR10 support, 1ms response time, and a 144Hz refresh rate.

name: Fitness Tracker
description: Advanced fitness tracker with heart rate monitoring, sleep tracking, and 7-day battery life.

name: VR Headset
description: Immersive VR headset with 360-degree tracking, 3D audio, and a lightweight, comfortable design.
